abstract: Comcast spent $3.1 million in the first quarter lobbying on its acquisition of a controlling stake in NBC Universal, among other issues, The Associated Press reported.
snippet: Comcast spent $3.1 million in the first quarter lobbying on its acquisition of a controlling stake in NBC Universal, among other issues, The Associated Press reported.
lead_paragraph: Comcast  spent $3.1 million in the first quarter lobbying on its acquisition of a controlling stake in NBC Universal, among other issues, The Associated Press reported, citing a disclosure report.

headline.main: Comcast Spent $3.1 Million on Lobbying in 1st Quarter
